title: Contact
Me
footer.description: Follow me on Instagram for daily motivation and updates

onlineTraining.title: Online Training
onlineTraining.description: Train anywhere and anytime. You get a simple plan, clear guidance, and support from me online. You can work out at home, in the gym, or even while traveling — and still stay on track with your goals

nutritionPlans.title: Nutrition Plans
nutritionPlans.description: Get an easy meal plan made for your goals and lifestyle. I help you understand what and how much to eat, so you can feel better, have more energy, and see real results. Simple, healthy, and clear — without stress or strict diets
